ItemType.name: omnidirectional laser cannon array
ItemType.description: A spread-fire laser cannon with an automated targeting system.

ItemType.name: dual Bolide laser blaster
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the dual Bolide is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: Bolide laser blaster array
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the Bolide array is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: omni dual Bolide laser blaster
ItemType.attributes: EI; EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Laser; Specialty; OmniWeapon
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the dual Bolide is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: omni Bolide laser blaster array
ItemType.attributes: EI; EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Laser; Specialty; OmniWeapon
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the spread-fire Bolide is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: dual fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced dual version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: fast-fire laser cannon array
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced spread-fire version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: omni dual fast-fire laser
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced dual version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: omni fast-fire laser array
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced spread-fire version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: omni recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Turreted Recoilless cannons are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: recoilless cannon array
ItemType.description: Recoilless cannon arrays are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: omni recoilless cannon array
ItemType.description: Omni Recoilless cannon arrays are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: omni dual recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons with linked fire controls on a rotating turret.

ItemType.name: omni light recoilless cannon
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; NAMI; Cannon; OmniWeapon; lightWeapon; NotForSale
ItemType.description: This specialized turreted version of the recoilless cannon shoots lighter projectiles but has a higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: dual light recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots twin lighter projectiles but has a higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: light recoilless cannon array
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots triple lighter projectiles but has a higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: omni dual light recoilless cannon
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; NAMI; Cannon; lightWeapon; NotForSale; OmniWeapon
ItemType.description: This specialized turreted version of the recoilless cannon shoots twin lighter projectiles but has a higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: omni light recoilless cannon array
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; NAMI; Cannon; lightWeapon; NotForSale; OmniWeapon
ItemType.description: This specialized turreted version of the recoilless cannon shoots triple lighter projectiles but has a higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: dual heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier dual version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: omni heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier turreted version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: heavy recoilless cannon array
ItemType.description: This is a heavier triple version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: omni dual heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a turreted heavier dual version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: omni heavy recoilless cannon array
ItemType.description: This is a turreted heavier triple version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: omni dual TK10 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The turreted dual TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The dual TK10 fires six small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: dual TK10 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The dual TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The dual TK10 fires six small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: omni TK10 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The turreted TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK10 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: dual DK10 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The dual Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires in twin bursts of three shells.

ItemType.name: omni DK10 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The Arbalest cannon is an automatic turreted minigun that fires in bursts of three shells.

ItemType.name: omni dual DK10 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The dual Arbalest cannon is a turreted automatic minigun that fires in twin bursts of three shells.

ItemType.name: NAMI fast-fire missile launcher
ItemType.description: This fast-fire launcher fires standard NAMI missiles at a very high rate. It is compatible only with the standard non-military missiles.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser Universal launcher
ItemType.description: Though slower and bulkier than other launchers, the Universal Launcher can handle all standard-sized missiles, even from third-party suppliers.

ItemType.name: dual AK15 Partisan cannon
ItemType.description: This dual recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: AK15 Partisan cannon array
ItemType.description: This recoilless kinetic cannon array, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: omni dual AK15 Partisan cannon
ItemType.description: This turreted dual recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: omni AK15 Partisan cannon array
ItemType.description: This turreted dual recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon version.

ItemType.name: heavy actinide waste cannon
ItemType.description: The heavy actinide waste cannon is a dirty weapon that shoots out a cloud of radioactive debris.

ItemType.name: omni Flenser relativistic cannon
ItemType.description: The turreted Flenser relativistic cannon is a much improved version of the recoilless cannon. Its greater power is able to fire small masses at nearly the speed of light.

ItemType.name: omni dual Flenser relativistic cannon
ItemType.description: The turreted dual Flenser relativistic cannon is a much improved version of the recoilless cannon. Its greater power is able to fire small masses at nearly the speed of light.

ItemType.name: PK50 Heavy Morning Star cannon
ItemType.description: NAMI's Heavy Morning Star cannon shoots a high-velocity cloud of dense particles that can severely damage medium to heavy armor.

ItemType.name: omni slam cannon
ItemType.description: The turreted slam cannon fires high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: omni Ballista 505 cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most successful Makayev designs, the turreted Shtorm repeater fires a cluster of high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: single x-ray laser cannon
ItemType.description: A single nuclear-powered laser source is the core of this weapon system.

ItemType.name: light tritium cannon
ItemType.description: The light tritium shells fired by this cannon detonate on contact in a thermonuclear explosion.

ItemType.name: Spinal Laser
ItemType.description: The spinal laser is so large that it is mounted down the entire length of the ship's hull, is the most fearsome single-emitter laser ever made.

ItemType.name: Plasma Blaster
ItemType.description: This military weapon emits powerful dual plasma blasts.

ItemType.name: omni NAMI missile launcher
ItemType.description: This turret-mounted launcher is compatible with KM100, KM110, KM120, KM500, KM550, XM300 and XM900 popular NAMI missiles.

ItemType.name: light Flenser relativistic cannon
ItemType.description: The light Flenser relativistic cannon fires tiny masses at nearly the speed of light.
